insert into t_goods_specification (mark_id, goods_id, specification_ids, server_status, base_price, sale_price,goods_no) values
(#{spec.markId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{spec.goodsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{spec.specificationIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{spec.serverStatus,jdbcType=BIT}, #{spec.basePrice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{spec.salePrice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{spec.goodsNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.select:
SELECT g.goods_id AS goodsId, g.specification_ids AS specificationIds, g.sale_price AS basePrice,g.goods_no AS goodsNo, IF(s.promotion_mode IS NULL,g.sale_price, CASE WHEN s.promotion_mode=0 THEN g.sale_price-s.price WHEN s.promotion_mode=1 THEN g.sale_price * s.discount END) AS salePrice, (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(attr_value SEPARATOR ' ') FROM db_goods.t_specification_info WHERE FIND_IN_SET(mark_id, g.specification_ids)) AS specs
FROM t_goods_specification g LEFT JOIN (SELECT s.promotion_mode,s.price,s.discount,i.goods_id FROM t_special_info s LEFT JOIN t_special_item i ON s.mark_id=i.special_id WHERE s.server_status=1 AND s.promotion_type=1 AND (CASE WHEN s.start_time IS NOT NULL THEN s.start_time < NOW() ELSE 1=1 END) AND (CASE WHEN s.end_time IS NOT NULL THEN s.end_time > NOW() ELSE 1=1 END)) AS s ON g.goods_id=s.goods_id WHERE g.goods_id=#{goodsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND g.specification_ids=#{specIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND g.server_status=1
